ArbHunter — Ad Arbitrage Intelligence (LLMs index)

Product
- Web app for ad arbitrage operators (media buyers, publishers, arbitrage teams).
- Core workflow: discover opportunities → generate creatives → organize into campaigns.

Core capabilities
1) Opportunity Sniffer (Discovery)
- Find profitable GEO + niche combinations for Facebook-to-AdSense arbitrage.
- Outputs: margin score, trend velocity, competition signals, related keywords.
- Route: /discovery (authenticated).

2) Creative Studio
- Generate 2 A/B creatives quickly (V3) or 5–20 batch creatives with multi-agent orchestration.
- Includes policy-aware prompting + QC loop (generate → assess → optional regenerate).
- Route: /creative-studio (authenticated).

3) Campaigns
- Save and manage generated creatives/copy as variations.
- Features: mark winner, favorites, tags, exports.
- Route: /campaigns (authenticated).

Billing & access
- Hard-gated authentication (Supabase Auth).
- Subscription + trials via Paddle (Merchant of Record).
- Monthly usage limits by plan (discoveries/month + creatives/month).
- Pricing route: /pricing (public).

APIs (selected)
- POST /api/discover
- POST /api/v3/generate-creatives
- POST /api/v3/generate-batch
- POST /api/paddle/checkout
- POST /api/webhooks/paddle

Positioning
- “Hunt” for profit margins: high-velocity intelligence for GEO spreads, creatives, and yield.
